sentences.en: Envision the conductor as an assemblage of driven , damped oscillators.
sentences.cn: 把导体看成是大量受迫阻尼振动的振子的集合.

sentences.en: He damped a hand towel and laid it across her forehead.
sentences.cn: 他沾湿了一条手巾，将它敷在她的额头上。

sentences.en: He damped his cloth before cleaning the windows.
sentences.cn: 擦窗子前他把抹布弄湿了.

sentences.en: Her splendid optimism damped him; it had too little traffic with the reasoning powers.
sentences.cn: 她的过分乐观使他沮丧; 因为那种乐观跟理解力太少联系.

sentences.en: Hillsden damped a hand towel and laid it across her forehead.
sentences.cn: 希尔斯登沾湿了一条手巾，将它敷在她的额头上。

sentences.en: If you walk in the rain for a while, your clothes will be damped.
sentences.cn: 如果你在雨中走, 那么你的衣服将被雨淋湿.

sentences.en: My wish of going abroad to study English damped down.
sentences.cn: 我想出国学英语的愿望渐渐地淡漠了.

sentences.en: She damped a towel and wrapped it round his leg.
sentences.cn: 她弄湿毛巾,把它裹在他的腿上.

sentences.en: She damped her cloth before cleaning the window.
sentences.cn: 擦窗之前她先把抹布弄湿.

sentences.en: The rate gyro feedback provides positive dynamic stability and well - damped transient response to commands or disturbances.
sentences.cn: 速度陀螺反馈提供正向动力学稳定性和对于指令式扰动的很好阻尼的瞬时响应.

sentences.en: The suspension of the mirrors must be very frictionless, but strongly damped.
sentences.cn: 反射镜的悬挂既要无摩擦, 但又要有强阻尼.

sentences.en: Their ardour was damped by my critics.
sentences.cn: 我的批评给他们的热情泼了冷水.

sentences.en: This may be damped or undamped forced notion.
sentences.cn: 它可以是阻尼强迫运动或非阻尼强迫运动.

sentences.en: We damped the fire down before we went to bed.
sentences.cn: 我们临睡觉前封好了火.

words.tran_cn: 阻尼的；[物]衰减的；被窒息的

phrases.tran_cn: 阻尼振荡；阻尼振动；减幅振荡

trans.tran_en: Something that is damp is slightly wet

trans.tran_cn: 使潮湿( damp的过去式和过去分词)，减弱，抑制，使沮丧
